root.name: Anna
root.description: The game is set in a sawmill based between Champoluc and Periasc, a place actually existing in the Val D'Ayas in Valle d'Aosta, Italy. Here the player faces puzzles and faces the presences who inhabit the buildings. Depending on the mental health of the character, the locations will change and reveal different secrets, which will lead to one of the three possible endings.The game is developed by independent game developers, Dreampainters, and runs on the Unity engine.SoundtrackThe soundtrack to Anna was composed by Italian gothic/progressive band Chantry.Extended editionOn April 13 the extended edition of Anna became available. This version improves a lot of features in the game:more environmentsmore hours of game playmore puzzlesadditional gameplay featuresenhanced graphicsimproved interfaceEveryone who bought the original editon of Anna is upgraded to this extended edition. When starting the game, it gives the player an option to choose for the original Anna or the Extended version.System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XPProcessor: Dual CoreMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: Shader model 3 graphic cardDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 850 MB HD spaceSound: Stereo sound cardRecommendedOS: Windows 7Processor: Quad CoreMemory: 4 GB RAMGraphics: Nvidia series 3/4/5 or ATI HD seriesDirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 850 MB HD spaceSound: 5.1/7.1 sound card
